MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Silverstone Grove, Mallory Ave and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.21am. Our engineers are on site  to investigate the cause of the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.18pm on the 16th of Jan 2021
